author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: Sudden game crash

comments.body:
MersenneTwisterFast.java not in current version

**Status:** CantReproduce
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

content:
_From [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/) on August 22, 2013 19:49:19_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Load the game (2012innistradDredge.dec deck)
2. Make a couple of turns
3. Game closes

game log:

CREATED ON 2013/08/22 15:40:08
MAGARENA VERSION 1.40, JRE 1.7.0_25, OS Windows 7_6.1 x86

LOG (P): Tap Mountain. Pay {R}. Play Stromkirk Noble.
LOG (P): Put Stromkirk Noble onto the battlefield.
MCTS cached=0
